@notice Closes a limit order position, has to be triggered by the owner of the position
 @param positionId The position ID linking the open order to its Uniswap Liquidity Position NFT

 @return price current pool price as sqrtPriceX96

@notice The first of the two tokens of the underlying Uniswap V3 pool, sorted by address
 @return The token contract address

 @return The token contract address

@notice Closes a limit order position, has to be triggered by the owner of the position
 @param positionId The position ID linking the open order to its Uniswap Liquidity Position NFT

@notice Getter to fetch current pool price
 @return price current pool price as sqrtPriceX96

@notice The first of the two tokens of the underlying Uniswap V3 pool, sorted by address
 @return The token contract address

@notice The second of the two tokens of the underlying Uniswap V3 pool, sorted by address
 @return The token contract address

params.positionId: The position ID linking the open order to its Uniswap Liquidity Position NFT
params.trader: The address of the wallet that owns the position

params.positionId: The position ID linking the open order to its Uniswap Liquidity Position NFT
params.side: Buy/Sell switch. True: buying token0 with token1, False: buying token1 with token0
params.sqrtPriceX96: The price of the order in the UniV3 format
params.trader: The address of the wallet that opened the position

params.executionPrice: The final execution price of the order (the average between the lower and upper boundary of the UniV3 LP)
params.positionId: The position ID linking the open order to its Uniswap Liquidity Position NFT
params.quantity: Updated position quantity in token value
params.side: Buy/Sell switch. True: buying token0 with token1, False: buying token1 with token0

params.newQuantity: Updated position quantity in token value

createOrder(bool,uint160,uint256).details: This function handles native ETH and token payments

params.side: Buy/Sell switch. True: buying token0 with token1, False: buying token1 with token0
params.sqrtPriceX96: The price of the order in the UniV3 format

returns.positionId: The position ID linking the open order to its Uniswap Liquidity Position NFT

params.positionId: The position ID linking the open order to its Uniswap Liquidity Position NFT
params.quantity: The quantity you want to remove from the existing position

The position ID linking the open order to its Uniswap Liquidity Position NFT

params.positionId: The position ID linking the open order to its Uniswap Liquidity Position NFT
The position ID linking the open order to its Uniswap Liquidity Position NFT

increaseSize(uint256,uint256).details: Call this only when the user wants to sell native ETH

params.positionId: The position ID linking the open order to its Uniswap Liquidity Position NFT
params.quantity: The incremental quantity you want to add to the existing position

onERC721Received(address,address,uint256.details: Whenever an {IERC721} `tokenId` token is transferred to this contract via {IERC721-safeTransferFrom} by `operator` from `from`, this function is called. It must return its Solidity selector to confirm the token transfer. If any other value is returned or the interface is not implemented by the recipient, the transfer will be reverted. The selector can be obtained in Solidity with `IERC721.onERC721Received.selector`.

params.positionId: The position ID linking the open order to its Uniswap Liquidity Position NFT

settleOrder(uint256).details: has to be called when the position is fully out of bounds

params.positionId: The position ID linking the open order to its Uniswap Liquidity Position NFT

returns.settlerFees0: The amount of fees collected in token0 for the settler
returns.settlerFees1: The amount of fees collected in token1 for the settler

Close(uint256,address).notice: Emitted when a position is closed by a user

Open(uint256,address,bool,uint160,uint25.notice: Emitted when a new order is opened

Settled(bool,uint256,address,uint256,uin.notice: Emitted when a position size is filled by a settler (=/= user)

SizeChanged(uint256,address,uint256).notice: Emitted when a position size is adjusted by a user

closePositionOwner(uint256).notice: Closes a limit order position, has to be triggered by the owner of the position

createOrder(bool,uint160,uint256).notice: Opens a new limit order with ETH

getActivityStatus(uint256).notice: Getter to fetch a given position's status

getOwner(uint256).notice: Getter to fetch a given position's owner

getPoolPrice().notice: Getter to fetch current pool price

getQuantity(uint256).notice: Getter to fetch a given position's size

getSide(uint256).notice: Getter to fetch a given position's side

getTickLower(uint256).notice: Getter to fetch a given position's lower tick

getTickUpper(uint256).notice: Getter to fetch a given position's upper tick

increaseSize(uint256,uint256).notice: Increases an existing order's size with native ETH

poolToken0().notice: The first of the two tokens of the underlying Uniswap V3 pool, sorted by address

poolToken1().notice: The second of the two tokens of the underlying Uniswap V3 pool, sorted by address

returnPositionToUser(uint256).notice: Returns the Uniswap NFT position to the position owner

settleOrder(uint256).notice: Closes a limit order position, has to be triggered by the owner of the position
